title: Yasero

embed.description: Images of ios uploaded by DavidRYasuo

body: What do ha think of my drawing of yasuo

replies.body:
try some fan art ok? You get more response and adoration over drawing pre existing art

(i'd like some colour)
DavidRR, your drawing is fantastic... NOW IT'S TIME TO GET SOME PAINT MAN, FILL THAT YASUO WITH COLOUR MAN!!! You should really try fan-art like Talon12 said!

Someday I would draw a castle in the sky, someday I would draw an epic looking warrior/monster etc, and someday I would draw my waifu and paste her on my wall.

Someday.
